remarks: Property of being a Noetherian left module with finite generation expanded in terms of spans.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
islnm2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
islnm2.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` M ) $.
islnm2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` M ) $.
islnm2 $p |- ( M e. LNoeM <-> ( M e. LMod /\ A. i e. S E. g e. ( ~P B i^i Fin ) i = ( N ` g ) ) ) $.
$d B g i $.
$d M g i $.
$d N g i $.
